description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. The popular drinking game now avaliable on your Xbox 360. Set custom rules and pass a controller round with all your friends. Many popular forfeits/rules included. Please drink responsibly.
